summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 are partially implemented: a new AsciiKarmSection is inserted before SocialProofSection and CultLineSection now renders an image above the heading. However, the diff does not clearly show required resource cleanup in the Three.js ASCII component, does not show the static image asset being added, and does not prove the Cult Line heading text exactly matches the required copy because it is sourced from LANDING_COPY.

missing_requirements.requirement: The uploaded image is served as a static frontend asset (not via backend) and loads correctly in production build.

missing_requirements.reason: The heading text is rendered from LANDING_COPY.cultLine.main, but the diff does not include the landingCopy value (or show it updated) to confirm the exact required string is displayed.
